title: Clergy

fields.name: Ability's:
fields.value:
-Select 1-5 Players. You learn if the majority of those players share your current win condition(3 uses)
-Gain two random cards that have the ability to heal(1 use)
-Play a Health Steal! on any player.(2 Uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-At the end of each night, you and your neighbors restore 1 HP. You ignore dead neighbors for this attribute.
-You have no hand cap.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all Town, Florae, Sentries, Ciry, Army, Mainframe, Everything, Neutral Killings and opposing evil Factions. You may spare all Crew, Neutral Benigns, Chaos and Evils however
